episode_event_pasiosalon_date_ch0091_00_:
Oh, hello, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Would you
like to chat for a bit?

It’s not often that just the two of us get together
and talk, is it?

My, you seem awfully nervous. You really don’t
need to be so formal.
It’s because you’re the Champion.

Are you saying I’m someone exceptional? Please,
don’t worry about positions like that. I’d be
happier if you were more at ease.
It’s because you’re Cynthia.

You mean because I’m the Champion? Please,
don’t worry about positions like that. I’d be
happier if you were more at ease.

Besides, just being the Champion doesn’t mean I’m
so very exceptional.

The top Pokémon Trainer changes continually with
the times.
From Blue to Red... From Alder to Iris...

Perhaps I will go down in history as a Champion
of Sinnoh.

But I won’t be the Champion forever. Someday,
another will take my place.

The important thing isn’t your title, I think, but
rather the impression you leave on others.
Speaking of which...do you have some time later?

I’d like to show you something that’s left a
wonderful and lasting impression on me.
I’ll go with you!

I’m so glad! I’ll let you know once the date and
time are settled.
I’d love to!

I’m glad you’re interested! I’ll let you know once
the date and time are settled.
See you then, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

At Cynthia’s invitation, [Name:PlayerNickname ]
came to a piano performance at Lear’s manor.

[Name:PlayerNickname ] and Cynthia enjoyed
the performance together...
Soothing music played...
Ahh, it’s wonderful.

Thank you for coming with me
today, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Were you surprised by my interest in piano music?

I just love the sound of the piano. Its tones seem
to soak through my whole body...

And you don’t just listen with your ears...but with
your heart as well.
Oops. That was cheesy.

But, don’t you agree that sounds and music really
stick with you, together with all sorts of memories?
I agree.

Right? Listening to music can bring back so many
memories, happy or sad.
Hmm...

Sometimes memories just pop into my head when
I’m listening to music. Doesn’t that happen to you?

Hmm... I wonder why I brought this up in the
first place.

Maybe it’s your influence. I don’t usually talk
about this type of thing at all.

Talking with you has made my heart feel...lighter,
somehow. Thanks, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

*chuckle* Somewhere along the way, you became
a very important figure in my own
personal history.
I do hope that continues!
